subtitles:
44448 47728 People once believed
that when someone dies...

47804 51928 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

52005 55208 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

55285 60320 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

60406 63322 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

63408 68203 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
112002 115848 There's a piece of glass.

120241 124566 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124643 127759 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131202 135000 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

135086 137244 All right, guys,
let's do it.

137321 140400 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

141848 144562 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144648 149328 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

152167 155361 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155447 160041 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

160127 162323 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162362 165124 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

165200 167684 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

167761 171079 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

171166 174043 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
174119 175961 All right, clear out.

177284 179768 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

181926 185964 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

186040 188160 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

188246 192006 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

201606 204320 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

204406 208280 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

208328 211484 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
211522 213766 She's my friend.
213843 217602 Her and Eric.
217641 219808 You lied to her about Eric.

221486 225044 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

225121 227365 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

236045 241521 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
241645 244925 She's gonna be fine.

263042 266926 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

267002 269764 I used to think that was true
about everything...
269841 274080 families, friends, feelings.

274128 277926 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277964 282165 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

318848 321927 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342364 345605 You know, what this place
needs is a...
345682 347926 good natural catastrophe.

348003 352242 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

352280 355167 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
355244 357440 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357526 360442 Hey, hey, let me do it.

360528 364403 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364441 366800 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

366848 368728 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
368766 371087 Hey, all right.
371164 373446 Now we're talking.
373523 378040 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

378126 381800 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381886 385645 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

385722 387448 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

387525 391045 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
391121 394200 They make you fart big time.

400280 402879 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402966 405488 from all the crap
floating around in it.
406600 410206 I wish I could have seen that.
468046 472362 Fire it up! Yeah!

509879 513648 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

535687 538919 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T- bird, cop car, cop car.

545882 548366 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

554168 556000 - Damn it!
- What was that?

556086 558647 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
558723 561888 Mickey, call it in for me!

651961 654925 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

655001 659327 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
659403 661523 Place looks fine to me.
661561 664285 Let's redecorate.
666682 670682 "Abash, the devil stood...

670720 673319 and felt how awful
goodness is.

673405 677807 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
690399 693046 No, no, no, me first.

738888 741679 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

745400 748843 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

748920 750761 Look at that.
Look at that.

752047 756324 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

759844 761762 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
761800 764802 You sick fuck.

764840 768408 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
771525 775725 Look at that!
777845 779801 Pussies drink last, man.

781000 783321 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

784683 787080 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
787167 789248 This one is.

789324 792125 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

792202 796325 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

796402 800123 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

800200 803163 - Fire it up! - Fire
it up! - Fire it up!
803240 805925 Fire it up! Fire it up!
806002 808966 Here's your shooters.

809042 810922 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

844882 848248 - I love you.
- Say that again.
853686 856965 Restaurant.

861444 864484 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

871246 873720 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

967840 970286 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

970362 974208 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
974285 976519 Leather purse. Leather.
976606 980921 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

981008 985362 A blood stain
that's on here?

985448 987961 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

988047 990761 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
990847 993485 Right there for ya.
993562 997762 Decisions, decisions.
999239 1002279 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1002366 1005243 ...child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1005281 1007564 Close the gate
when you go out!

1007640 1010201 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1012762 1016041 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020568 1024845 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1125602 1128604 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1131088 1135164 Halloween ain't till manana.
1175443 1178723 Fuck, you murderer!

1178800 1181322 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1181399 1185322 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1185408 1188688 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188726 1191201 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1191287 1195919 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1196005 1200762 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1200801 1203160 Her name was Shelly.

1203246 1206123 You cut her.
You raped her.

1206200 1211762 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1220605 1225323 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1225400 1229840 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1234367 1236803 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1236880 1239440 We never miss.

1249606 1251601 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1256482 1261124 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1284841 1289003 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1296081 1298728 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1303284 1306448 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1307522 1309364 Give me some of that
over there!

1311522 1315080 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1315128 1319721 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319760 1323443 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323519 1327566 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1327605 1331527 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1360327 1363962 You're thinking
about the past.
1366168 1368565 Dad gave me this.
1368642 1372641 Fifth birthday.

1372728 1377206 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1390527 1392887 Is she asleep?
1398842 1401000 I think we broke her.
1404846 1406879 I love her eyes.

1425686 1428726 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1446564 1451887 I told you to stay out of here.

1451925 1455445 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1455522 1459406 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1459444 1461688 I don't have any dolls.
1461765 1465006 Get some food, huh?

1465045 1467922 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1473408 1476927 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1486527 1489644 Thirty, forty dollars.
1491322 1493682 Who the fuck is this now?

1493720 1497719 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1500443 1504126 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1511405 1515481 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1522846 1527047 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1527085 1530883 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1532763 1534968 What are you talking about?
1535045 1537644 You heard me rapping, right?

1537721 1541682 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1544003 1546841 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1548328 1550562 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1554648 1559568 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1559645 1562080 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1570204 1572361 You're not paying attention.

1577320 1582403 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1583966 1587284 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1589883 1593403 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1598486 1600404 Who's this sack of shit?

1600480 1603319 That's Tin Tin, one of
T- bird's little helpers.

1603405 1606321 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1606407 1609083 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1609160 1613159 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1613245 1617762 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617839 1619680 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1619767 1623363 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1624524 1626844 What the hell
do you call that?
1627842 1630326 I call it blood, detective.

1630402 1634047 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1634085 1636761 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643206 1646006 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1646083 1648605 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1648643 1651444 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1651521 1655721 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1655807 1661082 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664525 1666999 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1683207 1687245 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1710166 1712966 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1713043 1716006 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1716083 1718807 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1718884 1721406 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1721483 1723765 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1723842 1728723 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1728800 1731687 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1731763 1735360 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1735446 1738083 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1738160 1740721 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1742322 1745564 Each one of these is a life...
1745641 1748048 a life you helped destroy.

1748125 1750647 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1750685 1754243 I'm not gonna kill you.

1754320 1758319 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1766605 1770643 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1772446 1776368 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1776445 1779926 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1780003 1782046 Is that gasoline I smell?

1803365 1806684 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1806760 1808966 One root beer.
1810884 1813522 I can't do anything.

1813608 1817885 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1824407 1829125 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1829164 1832079 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1832165 1835925 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1836001 1840960 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1841008 1844201 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1844240 1848440 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1848527 1851528 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1853322 1856362 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1856448 1860284 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1860361 1862922 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1862960 1867400 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1867448 1872081 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1872167 1876444 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1876521 1878842 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1878928 1883321 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1883407 1885881 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1885967 1889324 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1889401 1894522 - He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1894608 1898128 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1898205 1900526 Get away from there!

1900602 1903604 Cops!
Get outta here!
1912082 1916244 Oh, great, great.

1916321 1918805 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1918882 1921087 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1921164 1926765 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1926842 1930601 Little early
for Devil's Night.
1932126 1934725 You are very restless.

1934802 1937880 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1937967 1942043 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1953043 1955968 There are energies
aligning against you.

1956045 1958404 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

1976760 1980567 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1980644 1983722 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1983799 1985487 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1985564 1988124 You must be
awfully disappointed.

1988201 1991404 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1991443 1993648 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1993725 1998127 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1998166 2000640 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2000726 2003766 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2006327 2008801 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008888 2011563 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2011602 2014325 That's very reassuring.

2014364 2018248 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2018325 2022602 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2022688 2024443 Call it my need to know.
2056686 2059160 Let go, you creep!

2064128 2067284 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2068645 2070928 He couldn't have stopped.

2071005 2075119 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2075205 2078121 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2082082 2086647 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2087759 2091125 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2107362 2111764 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2111841 2116003 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2116080 2119359 Annie... look at that.

2119446 2123483 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments... "
2123560 2125526 What is this, a petition?

2125603 2128365 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2128442 2132364 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2132441 2138080 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2138166 2141561 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2141648 2145484 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2152207 2155803 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2157961 2162526 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2162564 2164962 Ah, I owe you one!

2193522 2197243 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2197320 2200839 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2224720 2227242 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2233159 2235681 Come here, bird.

2235768 2237763 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2237839 2240083 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2240122 2242644 Here, birdie, birdie.

2242682 2245560 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2248082 2251160 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2255965 2257845 What the fuck?

2263963 2268327 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2270523 2273285 Don't sweat it.

2274925 2277841 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285446 2290088 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2292006 2296724 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2296801 2300167 You need professional help.
2304445 2306967 He shoots! He scores!

2316682 2320240 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2320326 2322925 Stop me if you heard this one.

2323002 2325802 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2331000 2333647 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2333724 2337119 Don't you ever fucking die?
2337205 2339363 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2344648 2349040 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2351159 2355082 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2378319 2380247 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2383163 2385762 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2402804 2406525 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2417765 2422080 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2422167 2426722 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2436725 2441328 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2469879 2473408 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2473485 2475643 Now fill it up!
2476688 2479920 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2480006 2482567 I really need this.

2490805 2494603 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2494641 2497125 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2497202 2499561 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2499648 2502448 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2502525 2505200 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2508643 2511444 Hey, good night, Darla.
2513765 2517323 You stay put right there.
2525043 2528361 Get away, steamhead.

2558245 2563759 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2563807 2566445 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2566521 2569360 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2569446 2572285 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2572324 2574405 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2574481 2576524 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2576601 2581166 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2584120 2587486 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2591322 2593403 Good likeness.

2593480 2597048 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2597124 2599282 You still have your hat on.
2603042 2605046 I gotta sit down.
2614483 2618607 are you some kind of... ghost?

2627842 2632206 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2634124 2638047 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2638123 2641087 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2641164 2645565 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2645642 2648164 Come on. Read the file.

2648241 2652403 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2652480 2655568 Her body finally just gave it up.

2655607 2659328 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2668803 2670644 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2682843 2686008 I saw her
through your eyes.

2686085 2688080 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2688166 2693402 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2693479 2698044 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2698083 2700921 Give me something
I could work with.

2705563 2707961 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2708047 2711241 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2711327 2714645 would talk after
what happened to you?

2714722 2717800 I kept asking
questions and...

2717887 2720447 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2724283 2726163 This your wife?

2726240 2730527 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2735207 2739043 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2739120 2742486 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2742563 2745440 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2754685 2758962 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2763441 2766520 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2770001 2772600 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2775525 2781126 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2791762 2795128 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2795205 2798206 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2798283 2801208 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2801285 2804402 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2804440 2806886 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2806962 2811201 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2811288 2816083 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2816160 2818528 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2818605 2821003 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2821079 2826364 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2826440 2829087 You ain't lost everything.

2829164 2834046 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2834122 2837565 Fair enough. Catch.

2841047 2843367 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2843444 2845362 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2845401 2848920 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2849007 2852804 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2852881 2856842 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2859527 2864486 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2864562 2867679 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2867724 2870918 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2870764 2873805 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2873881 2876039 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2876125 2879482 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2879607 2882925 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2883002 2886243 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
2886320 2888487 Whatever the fuck that means.

2888526 2892161 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2893206 2895201 Want to relax
that thing now?

2895239 2899727 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2899804 2904005 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2904043 2906642 I ain't making all this up.

2906719 2911044 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2919282 2924087 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2933927 2936804 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2945723 2947919 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2950566 2955246 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2955323 2959082 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3020375 3022648 You lost or hungry?

3042615 3045214 I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3045290 3048091 One part falls, it all falls!
